basics.name: Josh Norman
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with extensive experience designing and deploying scalable, data-driven web applications leveraging C#, Java, Angular, React, Python, Azure, AWS, Databricks, and GitHub Actions. Expertise includes architecture design, legacy application modernization, and strategic UI enhancements. Proven success leading technical projects and mentoring developers, consistently delivering high-quality solutions that enhance user experience, application performance, and operational efficiency.

work.name: U.S. Department of Education
work.summary: Led development of data-driven web applications using Angular, C#, Node, Databricks, and Azure, enhancing architecture, UI design, and application scalability.
highlights: Co-Lead Developer on a data-driven web application, architecting solutions with Angular, C#, and Node, and leveraging Databricks and Azure for robust data processing and cloud integration.

Project Lead in modernizing a legacy application by integrating Angular for front-end innovation and Node with C# for back-end services, while utilizing Databricks and Azure to improve performance and scalability.

work.name: Optum
work.position: Full Stack Developer | Machine Learning Engineer
work.summary: Maintained and enhanced scalable web applications using Angular, React, Java, Spring, Databricks, GitHub Actions, and AWS, delivering strategic UI improvements and robust system integrations.
highlights: Developed full stack solutions with Angular and React on the front end and Java with Spring on the back end, while leveraging Databricks, GitHub Actions, and AWS for efficient deployment.
Led the integration and migration of a new code base into an existing infrastructure, ensuring seamless transitions and adherence to strict coding standards using Angular, React, Java, and Spring.

Mentored junior developers in system integration, coding best practices, and workflow management, reinforcing the use of Angular, React, Java, and supporting tools to enhance overall team performance.

work.name: MediaRif
work.summary: Full Stack Developer and UI specialist with extensive experience delivering responsive, SEO-optimized web applications. Expertise includes Angular, React, Java, C#, and Python, integrating robust frontend and backend solutions with efficient REST APIs and real-time WebSocket communications.
highlights: Collaborated with diverse clients, utilizing Angular, React, Java, C#, and Python to tailor solutions across multiple industries.
Recognized as the primary UI specialist, driving front-end innovation and delivering responsive, SEO-optimized applications.
Developed robust CRUD applications by integrating Angular/React for frontend interfaces with Java, C#, and Python for backend services.
Implemented efficient REST APIs and WebSocket communications, ensuring seamless real-time data interactions.
Managed deployments across AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure, optimizing scalability, reliability, and database performance.

education.summary: Active tutor and consistently on the Dean's List every semester.
Graduated with 100% and tutored students to help them catch up.

projects.name: Androcula VSCode Theme
projects.description: AVSCode theme inspired by Andromeda and Dracula, designed for developers who crave a clean and modern visual experience.
highlights: 5-star rated theme with thousands of downloads.

projects.name: Open Source Contributions to pandas_ta
projects.description: Contributed to pandas_ta, a popular financial technical analysis Python library, by addressing critical issues and enhancing feature reliability.
highlights: Found issues with future leakage and implemented effective fixes to ensure data integrity.
Implemented numpy2 update to modernize the codebase and improve compatibility.
Delivered small improvements on various features to optimize overall performance.
